title.rendered: The Eldorado Stone Outdoor Kitchen gets Featured as an Entertaining Move Outside

content.rendered: Homeowners are using their outdoor spaces as an extension of their living space, and entertaining in these areas expands the need for a variety of appliances and accessories tailored to individual lifestyles. January’s issue of Kitchen & Bath Design News spotlights Eldorado Stone Outdoor Kitchens as a way to customize outdoor spaces, noting that Eldorado Outdoor cabinets come in a variety of sizes and assemble into custom barbecue islands, kitchen counters, bars, fireplaces and more.
